name: BPower House
tag_list: it-solutions, technical-expertise, successful-projects, reduce-development-time, sq--server, oracle, mysql, asp, asp-net, css, javascript, programming, development, applications, web-based-applications
overview:
BPowerHouse is an international premier specialist IT solutions and services company, that combines core technical expertise with a global business perspective. The company’s key offerings include product development, migration, porting, re-engineering and e-commerce solutions.

BPowerHouse’s state-of-art technology centre is completely equipped with modern day technology aids and advancements.

The skill rich engineering resource - a great mix of techno-savvy professionals and business-savvy managers from various industry verticals - is adequately exposed to international work culture. BPowerHouse has a proven track record in delivering solutions on par with the best in the world.

The company bases its business philosophy on the judicious blend of exceptional customer service and relentless innovation in using advanced technology. This repertoire of benefits translate into new levels of reliability and efficiency for BPowerHouse’s global clientele.

Developing solutions that work seamlessly, maintaining global quality standards, BPowerHouse equips its customers with the edge to surge ahead towards tomorrow, today itself.
